sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with dao yan 倒黶 , inverted black mole. Xiao er dou zhen fang lun 小兒痘疹方論 , Lun dou zhen zhi fa 論痘診治法 , “On diagnostic and therapeutic patterns for smallpox”: 然倒靨、瀉、渴等症，若喜熱飲食，手足並冷，或不食嘔吐者，是 為陽氣虛寒也，用辛熱之劑補之 , “Now, in the case of conditions such as inverted mole , outflow, and thirst, when [patients] long for hot beverages and food, and if their hands and feet are all cold, in some cases they may not eat and rather vomit, this is a cold because of yang qi depletion. One employs acrid and hot preparations for supplementation”.
